analysis.description:
VestingTrustee.grant (/unique_chucks/31/0x53ab17c844abb25e570bf9042f60d7bed18d612b.sol#510-544) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(grants[_to].value == 0)

VestingTrustee.grant (/unique_chucks/31/0x53ab17c844abb25e570bf9042f60d7bed18d612b.sol#510-544) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(grants[_to].value == 0)
VestingTrustee.unlockVestedTokens (/unique_chucks/31/0x53ab17c844abb25e570bf9042f60d7bed18d612b.sol#612-617) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- vested == 0
	- transferable == 0

Reentrancy in VestingTrustee.grant (/unique_chucks/31/0x53ab17c844abb25e570bf9042f60d7bed18d612b.sol#510-544):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(totalVesting.add(_value) <= veganCoin.balanceOf(address(this))) (/unique_chucks/31/0x53ab17c844abb25e570bf9042f60d7bed18d612b.sol#529-530)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- grants (/unique_chucks/31/0x53ab17c844abb25e570bf9042f60d7bed18d612b.sol#530-537)
	- totalVesting (/unique_chucks/31/0x53ab17c844abb25e570bf9042f60d7bed18d612b.sol#540-542)

VestingTrustee.unlockVestedTokens (/unique_chucks/31/0x53ab17c844abb25e570bf9042f60d7bed18d612b.sol#612-617) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-veganCoin.transfer(msg.sender,transferable) (/unique_chucks/31/0x53ab17c844abb25e570bf9042f60d7bed18d612b.sol)

VeganCoin.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/31/0x53ab17c844abb25e570bf9042f60d7bed18d612b.sol#477)
